28. Use the following information to answer questions 28-30.Jason will have a rectangular concrete patio constructed beside his house, as shown below. The patio will be constructed so that one side of the patio is against a side of Jason’s house.28.The patio will have a thickness of 6 inches. What will be the charge for sealing Jason’s patio?

60. A news anchor made the true statement below.     If it is raining, then the parade is canceled.Which of the following statements is logically equivalent to the news anchor’s statement?

choices.A: If it is not raining, then the parade is not canceled.
choices.B: The parade is canceled if and only if it is raining.
choices.C: If it is not raining, then the parade is canceled.
choices.D: If the parade is canceled, then it is raining.
choices.E: If the parade is not canceled, then it is not raining.
